title: Platform limitation acknowledgment - Focus app requires native capabilities
constraints: Web applications cannot implement device-level content filtering
Web applications cannot enforce app usage time limits at the system level
The requested features require native mobile OS capabilities (iOS/Android) with system-level permissions
Internet Computer web apps cannot access or control other applications or system-level networking
nonGoals: Block adult content at the device or network level
Restrict access to other mobile applications
Implement system-wide DNS or network filtering
